newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Romanian Foreign Minister Adrian Severin is expected to attend a North Atlantic Council reunion in Portugal on May 30.
* The spring session of the Council of Europe's Parliamentary Assembly continued for a third day in Bucharest. The session is expected to adopt a Black Sea Region Charta.
* Romania is eager to boost its contribution to Council Of Europe activities, Prime Minister Victor Ciorbea said.
